title: them by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister 
of State at the Department of Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and 
Youth) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister state department child equality disability integration youth) order 2024

title: them by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of
heading: 2. Noel Byrne, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Noel Byrne, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and 
Youth, is appointed to be a Special Adviser to Anne Rabbitte, Minister of State 
at the Department of Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and Youth, with 
effect from 10 April 2024. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

18 June, 2024. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 21st June, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [332] 3
